message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your highest expectations. It's not just an object; it's a symbol of excellence and functionality. Given its value to you, I believe it's worth every penny of its $15,000 price tag. I understand that making such a significant purchase might require careful consideration. Therefore, I am offering you the opportunity to secure this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $14,500. This exclusive offer is valid for a limited time only. Please let me know if you have any questions or need more information to make your decision.
